reviewText: A young woman loses her husband partially due to the recklessness of privileged ne'er-do-well. She then loses her sight in an accident partially due to the same man. The man changes his life in devotion to her thereafter. This is an inspirational film that will leave you with a good feeling and perhaps inspire you to be kind and giving in your life. The acting is exceptional and the story is moving. You will like this film.
Haven't watched the whole thing, but appears to be a pretty good flick.
Movie was as expected but not packaged like it was new.
This is one of my favorites movies, I saw it about 5 months ago on TV and I just cryed when I watch m it it was beautiful.

This was a present for my mom. She's up in age and lives out of state. She had this on VHS, and couldn't watch it anymore. Because it was a one of her all-time favorites, I got it for her on DVD. Now she can watch any time.
